abstract: Ronald S Lauder co-founder of Neue Galerie and prominent advocate for restitution of art looted by Nazis, launches transparency initiative to provide clear provenance for pieces in museum's collection; finds one major work with questionable history that may be returned to those who claim rightful ownership.
lead_paragraph: The art collector, seeking to bolster provenance research at the Neue Galerie, says a work might be returned to people who claim to be the rightful owners.
snippet: The art collector, seeking to bolster provenance research at the Neue Galerie, says a work might be returned to people who claim to be the rightful owners....

headline.main: Ronald Lauder, Advocate of Art Restitution, Says His Museum Holds a Clouded Work
headline.print_headline: Lauder Finds Artwork With Cloudy Provenance in His Museum
